function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exponential increase in the use of telemedicine technology and chatbots","Impact":"Increased reliance on technology may lead to decreased in-person medical assessments and potential misdiagnosis of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Training medical professionals on effective use of telemedicine technology and chatbots, and emphasizing the importance of in-person assessments for certain health conditions.","Technologies":"Telehealth services, chatbots, video consultations","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Difficulty in getting basic needs during quarantine period","Impact":"Inadequate access to food and other essential supplies may lead to increased social contact as people seek out alternative sources.","Mitigation":"Implementing controlled market opening with limited people and social distancing measures, providing supplies to severely affected areas, and creating a system for online ordering and delivery.","Technologies":"Online market platforms, delivery services","People":"General public","Owner":"Private, public, or government agencies"}]}
